---
title: "Data apps from the JHU DSL"
---

This is a gallery of apps created in collaboration with the Johns Hopkins Data Science Lab. 


### papr

<div class="row">
  <div class="col-md-6">
* __What is it?__ In Silicon-Valley speak [papr](https://jhubiostatistics.shinyapps.io/papr/) is "Tindr for preprints". It shows the user a random pre-print off of [biorxiv](http://biorxiv.org/) and lets them rate it for correctness and for interest with a gesture.
* __Who wrote it?__ Lucy D'Agostino McGowan, Nicholas Strayer, and Jeff Leek
  </div>
  <div class="col-md-6">
[![](images/papr.png)](https://jhubiostatistics.shinyapps.io/papr/)
  </div>
</div>

---

### recount

<div class="row">
  <div class="col-md-6">
* __What is it?__ [recount](https://jhubiostatistics.shinyapps.io/recount/) is a database of analysis-ready RNA-seq data sets processed from a public database. Users can download them as .csv files or as processed R objects. 
* __Who wrote it?__ Leonardo Collado-Torres
  </div>
  <div class="col-md-6">
[![](images/recount.png)](https://jhubiostatistics.shinyapps.io/recount/)
  </div>
</div>

---

### mindfulness

<div class="row">
  <div class="col-md-6">
* __What is it?__ [mindfulness](https://github.com/mattkcole/mindfulness) provides a convenient way for patients to access wellness audio files and provides use measurement for researchers. 
* __Who wrote it?__ Sarah Salter and Matt Cole
  </div>
  <div class="col-md-6">
[![](images/mindfulness.png)](https://github.com/mattkcole/mindfulness)
  </div>
</div>

### HEAP

<div class="row">
  <div class="col-md-6">
* __What is it?__ [HEAP](https://jhubiostatistics.shinyapps.io/heap/) - the Home Environmental Assessment Protocol - is a digital form designed for social workers and home-care professionals to assess the safety of geriatric patient's dwellings.
* __Who wrote it?__ Yifan Zhou, Wenyi Lin, and Ding Ding
  </div>
  <div class="col-md-6">
[![](images/heap.png)](https://jhubiostatistics.shinyapps.io/heap/)
  </div>
</div>
